verses.verse: My <S%H410>God<s%>, my <S%H410>God<s%>, why have you <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H7350>me<s%>? why are you so far from <S%H3444>helping<s%> <S%H1697>me<s%>, and from the words of my <S%H7581>roaring<s%>?
O my <S%H430>God<s%>, I <S%H7121>cry<s%> in the <S%H3119>daytime<s%>, but you <S%H6030>hear<s%> <S%H3915>not<s%>; and in the night season, and am not <S%H1747>silent<s%>.
But you are <S%H6918>holy<s%>, O you that <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
Our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H982>trusted<s%> in <S%H982>you<s%>: they trusted, and you did deliver <S%H6403>them<s%>.
They <S%H2199>cried<s%> unto <S%H4422>you<s%>, and were delivered: they <S%H982>trusted<s%> in <S%H954>you<s%>, and were not confounded.
But I am a <S%H8438>worm<s%>, and no <S%H376>man<s%>; a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>, and <S%H959>despised<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
All they that <S%H7200>see<s%> me laugh me to <S%H3932>scorn<s%>: they shoot <S%H6358>out<s%> the <S%H8193>lip<s%>, they <S%H5128>shake<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%>, saying,
He <S%H1556>trusted<s%> on the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that he would <S%H6403>deliver<s%> <S%H5337>him<s%>: let him deliver <S%H2654>him<s%>, seeing he delighted in him.
But you are he that <S%H1518>took<s%> me out of the <S%H990>womb<s%>: you did make me <S%H982>hope<s%> when I was upon my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H7699>breasts<s%>.
I was <S%H7993>cast<s%> upon you from the <S%H7358>womb<s%>: you are my <S%H410>God<s%> from my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H990>belly<s%>.
Be not <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H6869>me<s%>; for trouble is <S%H7138>near<s%>; for there is none to <S%H5826>help<s%>.
<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> have <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> <S%H47>me<s%>: strong bulls of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> have beset me <S%H3803>round<s%>.
They <S%H6475>gaped<s%> upon me with their <S%H6310>mouths<s%>, as a <S%H2963>ravening<s%> and a <S%H7580>roaring<s%> <S%H738>lion<s%>.

I am poured <S%H8210>out<s%> like <S%H4325>water<s%>, and all my <S%H6106>bones<s%> are out of <S%H6504>joint<s%>: my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is like <S%H1749>wax<s%>; it is <S%H4549>melted<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of my <S%H4578>bowels<s%>.

My <S%H3581>strength<s%> is dried <S%H3001>up<s%> like a <S%H2789>potsherd<s%>; and my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>cleaves<s%> to my <S%H4455>jaws<s%>; and you have <S%H8239>brought<s%> me into the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>.

For <S%H3611>dogs<s%> have <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> <S%H5712>me<s%>: the assembly of the <S%H7489>wicked<s%> have <S%H5362>enclosed<s%> <S%H3738>me<s%>: they pierced my <S%H3027>hands<s%> and my <S%H7272>feet<s%>.
I may <S%H5608>tell<s%> all my <S%H6106>bones<s%>: they <S%H5027>look<s%> and stare upon <S%H7200>me<s%>.
They <S%H2505>part<s%> my <S%H899>garments<s%> among <S%H5307>them<s%>, and cast <S%H1486>lots<s%> upon my <S%H3830>vesture<s%>.
But be not you <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Lord: O my <S%H360>strength<s%>, <S%H2363>haste<s%> you to help <S%H5833>me<s%>.
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; my <S%H3173>darling<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H3611>dog<s%>.
<S%H3467>Save<s%> me from the <S%H738>lion<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: for you have <S%H6030>heard<s%> me from the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H7214>unicorns<s%>.
I will <S%H5608>declare<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> unto my <S%H251>brothers<s%>: in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> will I praise <S%H1984>you<s%>.

You that <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H2233>him<s%>; all you the seed of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H3513>glorify<s%> <S%H1481>him<s%>; and fear <S%H2233>him<s%>, all you the seed of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

For he has not <S%H959>despised<s%> nor <S%H8262>abhorred<s%> the <S%H6039>affliction<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%>; neither has he <S%H5641>hid<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H7768>him<s%>; but when he cried unto <S%H8085>him<s%>, he heard.
My <S%H8416>praise<s%> shall be of you in the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>congregation<s%>: I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%> before them that fear <S%H3373>him<s%>.

The <S%H6035>meek<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>: they shall <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H3824>him<s%>: your heart shall <S%H2421>live<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>.

All the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>world<s%> shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and all the <S%H4940>kindreds<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> before <S%H6440>you<s%>.
For the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s: and he is the <S%H4910>governor<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

All they that be <S%H1879>fat<s%> upon <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%>: all they that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6083>dust<s%> shall <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2421>him<s%>: and none can keep alive his own <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
A <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5608>him<s%>; it shall be accounted to the <S%H136>Lord<s%> for a <S%H1755>generation<s%>.
They shall <S%H935>come<s%>, and shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> unto a <S%H5971>people<s%> that shall be <S%H3205>born<s%>, that he has done <S%H6213>this<s%>.
